name: Advance
description: Shows related articles to the active page and For you feed based on your browsing history.
author: Laserlike Inc. (https://www.laserlike.com/)

scripts.build:manifest: node -e 'let input = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync("package.json")); input.version = input.version.slice(0, -1) + Math.floor((Date.now() - new Date(new Date().getFullYear().toString()).getTime()) / 3600000); console.log(JSON.stringify(input))' | mustache - addon/manifest.json.tmpl > addon/manifest.json
scripts.build:web-ext: web-ext build --source-dir=addon --overwrite-dest --ignore-files '*.tmpl' && zip -r web-ext-artifacts/`ls -t1 web-ext-artifacts | head -n 1` addon
scripts.package: npm run build && cp web-ext-artifacts/`ls -t1 web-ext-artifacts | head -n 1` addon.xpi
